name: SuperBoxman
description:
A simple game about throwing boxes at dudes. 

I'll be honest I'm not super satisfied with how this game came out, doubly so since its the last one I was able to make before my job started taking up too much of time. It's actually been finished for quite a while, but I've been reluctant to release it. Since I'm going to try to get back into dev again, I thought I probably post this anyway.
Why?
Idk.

-Music by MusMus
http://musmus.main.jp/english.html
